Nairobi Hospital é um hospital líder no Quênia.

Adicione aqui a descrição do seu trabalho atual, responsabilidades e conquistas.

The Nairobi Hospital is a leading non-profit medical center, recognized throughout East Africa as an advanced diagnostic, treatment, and referral hub. With a history of medical excellence since 1954, it has invested heavily in the latest technology and highly qualified professionals to provide world-class, patient-centered care. The hospital is renowned for its multi-specialty services, including emergency and trauma care, and for translating its expertise into internationally compliant healthcare practices.

My internship at The Nairobi Hospital involved tackling two key operational challenges. First, I addressed the underperforming public website by leading its redesign , which directly resulted in a 20% boost in performance and responsiveness. Secondly, I co-designed a new lightweight internal ticketing system to resolve IT support inefficiencies, successfully cutting issue resolution time by 55%.

Naret Olosho CBO is a community-based organization dedicated to driving social change at a grassroots level. Its core mission is focused on three key pillars: promoting women's empowerment, supporting vulnerable groups within the community, and actively engaging rural youth through targeted education and advocacy programs.

As a Volunteer Leader for Naret Olosho CBO, I was tasked with turning the organization's social goals into functioning, on-the-ground programs. The CBO aimed to support diverse community needs, but required structured initiatives to be effective. I took responsibility for designing and executing these initiatives from the ground up. I personally organized and launched new educational workshops to engage rural youth, coordinated logistics for support drives aimed at vulnerable groups, and developed advocacy campaigns to promote women's empowerment. Through this hands-on leadership, I successfully mobilized volunteers and delivered multiple, tangible support programs, translating a mission into real-world community action.

A Fácil Tecnologias LTDA é uma empresa focada em soluções para educação, seu principal produto é um conjunto de soluções para estudos na obtenção da carteira nacional de habilitação (CNH), entre elas, multimídias, aplicativos on-line, aplicativos móveis, livros, entre outros.

Na Fácil Tecnologias LTDA, entrei em contato com desenvolvedores seniores, aprendendo as melhores práticas, padrões e como debater idéias e oferecer soluções diversas para o mesmo problema. Foi o ponto de partida, uma oportunidade única de transformar o conhecimento teórico em soluções concretas que estavam sendo usadas por centenas de pessoas todos os dias.

Kenya Ports Authority is a state corporation that functions as the dynamic heart of trade for Kenya and the East and Central Africa region. Its primary responsibility is managing and operating Kenya's scheduled seaports, including the flagship Port of Mombasa.

At Kenya Ports Authority, I supported critical IT operations. My role was focused on contributing to the team's efforts in maintaining system stability, which was a key part of achieving and sustaining 99.5% network uptime. This was a unique opportunity to apply a results-oriented mindset and understand how robust IT infrastructure directly supports the vital, large-scale logistics and trade operations of the nation.
